input: user: A majestic waterfall cascading into a crystal-clear pool amidst a lush rainforest, under the soft light of an overcast sky. The setting conveys peace and untouched beauty.
coverage: A majestic waterfall cascades gracefully into a crystal-clear pool, its waters shimmering amidst the vibrant greens of a lush rainforest. The scene is bathed in the soft, diffuse light of an overcast sky, casting gentle shadows and enhancing the natural hues. Surrounding the waterfall, dense foliage and wildflowers paint a picture of untamed wilderness. The image evokes a sense of serene peace and untouched beauty, inviting viewers into a tranquil haven far from the world's chaos.
